record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, MARCH 3, 2008
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, MARCH 3, 2008 -- (House of Representatives - February 28, 2008)

[Page: H1169]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 2 p.m. on Monday next, and further, when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Tuesday, March 4, for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
